related_questions.question:
Arrange the words into good sentence

tolong di jawab 
​

My New Backpack    I have a new backpack. Its color is soft green. I
always bring it when I go to school. It is made of strong
fabric. There are several parts of my backpack. The first
part is the pocket. I put my money and my library card
in the pocket. The second part is the main part. I put my
books and pencil case in this part. The third part is a
small pocket on the left side of the backpack. I keep a
bottle of water in this pocket.
1. How many parts of the writer's backpack?
2. What is the function of the main part of the backpack?
3. blue - He-pale-has-eyes - skin - and
1 2 3 4
4 5
5 6 7
nac these sentences into the correct order.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1.three parts

2.to put his books and pencil case

3.he has blue eyes and pale skin

related_questions.question:
⬇QUIZ⬇

Sebutkan rumus simple last tense ! 

No ngasal​

answers.answer:
Verbal

  • (+) S + Verb₂ + o/c
  • (-) S + did not/didn’t + +Verb₁ + o/c
  • (?) Did + S + Verb₁ + o/c ?

Nominal

  • (+) S + to be (was/were) + Adj/Adv/Noun
  • (-) S + to be (was/were) + not + Adj/Adv/Noun
  • (?) To be (was/were) + S + Adj/Adv/Noun

Pembahasan

Simple past tense adalah sebuah kata kerja yang digunakan untuk berbicara tentang aktivitas masa lalu. Simple Past sendiri biasanya menggunakan past verb/verb 2. Keterangan waktu yang biasa digunakan yaitu last week, last night, last month, last year, yesterday dsb.

Contoh kalimat

Verbal

  • (+) She went to Jakarta yesterday
  • (-) She didn't go to Jakarta yesterday
  • (?) Did she go to Jakarta yesterday?

Nominal

  • (+) You were a student last year
  • (-) You were not a student last year
  • (?) Were you a student last year?

Pelajari lebih lanjut

  • 1.rumus simpel past tense dan berikan 3 contoh kalitugas: brainly.co.id/tugas/29713480
  • berikan 15 contoh simple past tense beserta positif, negatif dan interogatif ?? : brainly.co.id/tugas/14440709
  • buatlah 5 kalimat past tense (+) (-) (?) : brainly.co.id/tugas/24486587

Detail jawaban

Kelas : 8

Mapel : Bahasa Inggris

Materi : Chapter 9 — Past tense

Kode Mapel : 5

Kode Kategorisasi : 8.5.9
